sentence.Network_en: Two out of every three Britons already own a video recorder.
sentence.Network_cn: 每3个英国人中就有两个已经有了录像机。

sentence.Network_en: My tape recorder did not catch every last word.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的录音机并没有把每一个字都录下来。

sentence.Network_en: Miss Bennett whiled away the hours playing old films on her video-recorder.
sentence.Network_cn: 贝内特小姐用录像机播放老电影来消磨时间。

means.word_mean: 抄录员,编年史者,速记员

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a kind of judge): from Anglo-Norman French recordour, from Old French recorder 'bring to remembrance'; partly reinforced by the verb record (also used in the obsolete sense 'practise a tune': see sense 4)

entry.def: You can refer to a cassette recorder, a tape recorder, or a video recorder as a recorder.

example.ex: Rodney put the recorder on the desk top and pushed the play button.
example.tran: 罗德尼把录音机放在桌面上，按下了播放键。

entry.def: A recorder is a wooden or plastic musical instrument in the shape of a pipe. You play the recorder by blowing into the top of it and covering and uncovering the holes with your fingers.

entry.tran: 刑事法院兼职法官（英格兰和威尔士的法律体制下被任命在刑事法庭兼任法官的律师）
entry.def: In the legal system of England and Wales, a recorder is a lawyer who is appointed as a part-time judge in the Crown Court.
A recorder is a machine or instrument that keeps a record of something, for example in an experiment or on a vehicle.

example.ex: Data recorders also pinpoint mechanical faults rapidly, reducing repair times.
example.tran: 数据记录仪还能迅速查明机械故障，减少维修次数。

means.word_mean: 3. a barrister or solicitor who serves as part-time judge in towns or boroughs
4. a woodwind with a vertical pipe and 8 finger holes and a whistle mouthpiece

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨
stems_affixes.word_buile: mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官

employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者

light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产者,制作者;演出人;制片人
